name: TONIGHT
content: We're back again one more time
You broke my heart then ran away
Got my senses all in check
Nah, never gonna diss that's right
You were my one and only
Want that for you and me
呼吸も出来ないくらい
君のその指で 大胆に釘付け
We're back again one more time
You broke my heart then ran away
So tonight the party will not stop
On and on we take it to the top
俺以外は Say no' 聞かせて 今
Now I know what I know
Love has just gotten me, uh!
I'm at a good place baby right now
呼吸も出来ないくらい
君のその指で 大胆に乱れて
真夜中 隠れるように
呼吸も出来ないくらい
呼吸も出来ないくらい
